Initials: Decorated initial A is beneath miniature
Objects: Bed with blue canopy patterned with pinnate-shaped leaves and blue bed cover patterned with the same leaves, chair with rounded back, laver hanging above basin
Architecture: Interior scene with tiled floor, paned windows, arched doorway, arched architectural surround
Other: Arched gilt frame around the miniature, full floral and foliate border in colors and gilt which includes unidentified coat of arms within a barbed quatrefoil in lower margin
